basics.name: Marko Ranđelović
basics.label: Programmer
basics.summary: Very tallented programmer with ability to write correct software that does exactly what it's thought out. I finished mixed mathematics, computer science and informatics studies at University of Niš. I worked for 9 years as programmer in "Jastrebac" pump factory. I am well informed about free and open-source philosophy and practices and follow developments.

work.summary: Care about development of all parts of information system of the enterprise in programming language Progress 4GL. Modify database structure as needed. Information system covers human resources, accounting, sales, constructional and technological information, all with various reports. Administration of UNIX server and Progress database.
Maintenance of complex entitlement/billing system. Finding causes of technical problems using web applications, command-line programs and fixing them using SQL.

publications.name: Software Modeling of Acoustic Properties of Musical Instruments and Sound Generation Using Linear Combination of Oscilatory Functions with Non-Constant Coeficients

references.name: Peter Burchhardt
references.reference: Marko used his creativity and expert skills in Linux, shell-scripting, php, and Python to create several different efficient, reliable, and well-documented systems for us. Some of these systems had quite difficult scale and performance requirements, which Marko solved beautifully. Highly recommended.
